## Source: ossf-package-analysis (d7917dfb8691c19dbb896a26b03004bfa6ac280745ce23f44939f929faffbc94)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@bughunter0007/packages-analytics' @ 1.2.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
